resources.string: College of Commerce, Arts and Science, Patna (est. 1949) is a constituent unit of Patliputra University, Patna, established in 1949 is one of the oldest colleges of Patna and is known for imparting quality undergraduate and postgraduate education.In 2016 the college was renamed from College of Commerce to College of Commerce, Arts And Science.It was established in 1949 by Pt. Indu Shekhar Jha on the advice of Dr. Rajendra Prasad. We are one of the oldest academic institutions in Patna. We strive to keep the legacy of our ancestors alive by imparting values, knowledge, and wisdom to our Students.College of Commerce, Arts And Science, Patna was reaccredited with Grade â€“ A in 2016 with CGPA. "
